articles.title: Liverpool winger Luis Diaz explains 'childish' transfer wish and Lionel Messi meeting
articles.description: Luis Diaz has opened up on life after Liverpool transfer and meeting Argentina great Lionel Messi
articles.content:
Luis Diaz had admitted he has a "childish dream" to play in Spain - but is only focused on earning silverware with Liverpool.
Diaz has proven a huge success since arriving from Porto for £50million in January, starting the League Cup and FA Cup final... [3445 chars]

articles.title: Tennis Legend’s ‘Life Dream’ to Witness Lionel Messi Gets Shattered After Argentina’s Shock Loss at FIFA World Cup 2022
articles.description: Many tennis players had flown to Qatar to support Lionel Messi at the 2022 World Cup, like Victoria Azarenka and Diego Schwartzman.

Published 11/23/2022, 7:45 AM EST

articles.title: Saudi's Al-Shahrani to undergo surgery and likely out of World Cup
articles.description: Saudi Arabia defender Yasser Al-Shahrani's World Cup is likely over as he will undergo surgery after sustaining a facial injury during the 2-1 Group C victory over Argentina on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Al-RAYYAN, Qatar, Nov 23 (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia defender Yasser Al-Shahrani's World Cup is likely over as he will undergo surgery after sustaining a facial injury during the 2-1 Group C victory over Argentina on Tuesday.

articles.title: Lionel Messi fronts up to defeat after World Cup shock
articles.description: Argentina's game against Saudi Arabia on Tuesday was supposed to serve as the perfect springboard for Lionel Messi's last dance at the World Cup.
articles.content:
Doha, Qatar CNN —
Argentina’s game against Saudi Arabia on Tuesday was supposed to serve as the perfect springboard for Lionel Messi’s last dance at the World Cup.

articles.title: World Cup loss raises doubts about Argentina's fitness
articles.description: DOHA, Qatar (AP) — Unfortunately for Argentina fans, it wasn’t just a bad dream. Their team really did lose 2-1 to Saudi Arabia in one of the biggest shocks in the World Cup’s 92-year history. Now the pressure is on Lionel Messi and Argentina, who cannot afford to lose their next match against Mexico on Saturday if they want to keep their World Cup hopes alive.
articles.content:
Argentina's head coach Lionel Scaloni, right, and assistant coach Pablo Aimar stand on the field during a training session of Argentina's national soccer team in Doha, Wednesday, Nov. 23, 2022. (AP Photo/Jorge Saenz)

articles.title: Saudi Arabia's win over Argentina is the greatest upset
articles.description: Argentina won the World Cup in 1978 and 1986, but at Qatar 2022, it made history in a different way. Gracenote calls Argentina's 2-1
articles.content:
Saudi Arabia’s win over Argentina is the greatest upset
Argentina won the World Cup in 1978 and 1986.
At Qatar 2022, it made history in a different way.
Argentina’s 2-1 loss to Saudi Arabia in Group C was the biggest World Cup upset.
